get.description: Gets all the builds for a registry.

parameters.name: $filter
parameters.description: The builds filter to apply on the operation.

parameters.name: $top
parameters.description: $top is supported for get list of builds, which limits the maximum number of builds to return.

parameters.name: $skipToken
parameters.description: $skipToken is supported on get list of builds, which provides the next page in the list of builds.

200.description: The request was successful; the request was well-formed and received properly.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: Gets the detailed information for a given build.

200.description: The request was successful; the request was well-formed and received properly.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed. If the registry/build doesn't exist, 404 (Not found) is returned.

200.description: The request was successful; the request was well-formed and received properly.

201.description: The request was successfully accepted; the operation will complete asynchronously. The provisioning state of the resource should indicate the current state of the resource.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed. If the registry/build doesn't exist, 404 (Not found) is returned. If any of the input parameters is wrong, 400(Bad Request) is returned.

post.description: Gets a link to download the build logs.

200.description: The request was successful; the request was well-formed and received properly.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed. If the registry/build doesn't exist, 404 (Not found) is returned.

200.description: The request was successful; the request was well-formed and received properly.

202.description: The request was successfully accepted; the operation will complete asynchronously.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed. If the registry/build doesn't exist, 404 (Not found) is returned.

get.description: List all the build steps for a given build task.

200.description: The request was successful; the request was well-formed and received properly.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: Gets the build step for a build task.

200.description: The request was successful; the request was well-formed and received properly.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed. If the registry/step doesn't exist, 404 (Not found) is returned.

put.description: Creates a build step for a build task.

parameters.name: buildStepCreateParameters
parameters.description: The parameters for creating a build step.

200.description: The request was successful; the request was well-formed and received properly.

201.description: The request was successfully accepted; the operation will complete asynchronously. The provisioning state of the resource should indicate the current state of the resource.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed. If the registry doesn't exist, 404 (Not found) is returned.If any of the input parameters is wrong, 400(Bad Request) is returned.

delete.description: Deletes a build step from the build task.

200.description: The request was successful; the request was well-formed and received properly.

202.description: The request was successfully accepted; the operation will complete asynchronously.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

patch.description: Updates a build step in a build task.

parameters.name: buildStepUpdateParameters
parameters.description: The parameters for updating a build step.

200.description: The request was successful; the request was well-formed and received properly.

201.description: The request was successfully accepted; the operation will complete asynchronously. The provisioning state of the resource should indicate the current state of the resource.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed. If the registry/step doesn't exist, 404 (Not found) is returned.If any of the input parameters is wrong, 400(Bad Request) is returned.

post.description: List the build arguments for a step including the secret arguments.

200.description: The request was successful; the request was well-formed and received properly.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed. If the registry/step doesn't exist, 404 (Not found) is returned.

get.description: Lists all the build tasks for a specified container registry.

parameters.name: $filter
parameters.description: The build task filter to apply on the operation.

parameters.name: $skipToken
parameters.description: $skipToken is supported on get list of build tasks, which provides the next page in the list of tasks.

200.description: The request was successful; the request was well-formed and received properly.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: Get the properties of a specified build task.

200.description: The request was successful; the request was well-formed and received properly.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed. If the registry doesn't exist, 404 (Not found) is returned.

put.description: Creates a build task for a container registry with the specified parameters.

parameters.name: buildTaskCreateParameters
parameters.description: The parameters for creating a build task.

200.description: The request was successful; the request was well-formed and received properly.

201.description: The request was successfully accepted; the operation will complete asynchronously. The provisioning state of the resource should indicate the current state of the resource.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed. If the registry doesn't exist, 404 (Not found) is returned. If any of the input parameters is wrong, 400(Bad Request) is returned.

202.description: The request was successfully accepted; the operation will complete asynchronously.

200.description: The request was successful; the request was well-formed and received properly.

201.description: The request was successfully accepted; the operation will complete asynchronously. The provisioning state of the resource should indicate the current state of the resource.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed. If the registry doesn't exist, 404 (Not found) is returned. If any of the input parameters is wrong, 400(Bad Request) is returned.

post.description: Get the source control properties for a build task.

200.description: The request was successful; the request was well-formed and received properly.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed. If the registry doesn't exist, 404 (Not found) is returned.

parameters.name: buildRequest
parameters.description: The parameters of a build that needs to queued.

202.description: The request was successfully accepted; the operation will complete asynchronously.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed. If the registry/build doesn't exist, 404 (Not found) is returned. If any of the input parameters is wrong, 400(Bad Request) is returned.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed. If the registry/build doesn't exist, 404 (Not found) is returned.

status.description: The current status of the build.

sourceLocation.description:
The URL(absolute or relative) of the source that needs to be built. For Docker build, it can be an URL to a tar or github repository as supported by Docker.
If it is relative URL, the relative path should be obtained from calling getSourceUploadUrl API.
